snippet: TISHMAN--John. AECOM is saddened by the death of John L. Tishman. A renowned builder, he broke new ground in construction management and transformed an industry. He oversaw the development of numerous national icons, including the original World Trade Center Twin Towers in his hometown of New York City. Furthermore, he dedicated his life to philanthropy and building a better world. Skylines across the country reflect his important legacy. On behalf of the board of directors, leadership team and employees, we express our deepest sympathy to his son Dan Tishman, AECOM Vice Chairman, his daughter Katherine Blacklock and the entire Tishman family. Mike Burke, Chairman and CEO 1/3
lead_paragraph: TISHMAN--John. AECOM is saddened by the death of John L. Tishman. A renowned builder, he broke new ground in construction management and transformed an industry. He oversaw the development of numerous national icons, including the original World Trade Center Twin Towers in his hometown of New York City. Furthermore, he dedicated his life to philanthropy and building a better world. Skylines across the country reflect his important legacy. On behalf of the board of directors, leadership team and employees, we express our deepest sympathy to his son Dan Tishman, AECOM Vice Chairman, his daughter Katherine Blacklock and the entire Tishman family. Mike Burke, Chairman and CEO 1/3
